description:
Protect your bike from the bumps and dings of everyday life. Ridewrap’s a protection film is designed for bikes, not cars, not helicopters, bikes. “Self-healing” vinyl compound keeps your paint looking fresh, because as cool as scars are, they don’t help resale value.

  • Covered kits offer ~60% coverage and protect the most high risk areas: top of the toptube, bottom of the bottom tube, chainstays, and seat stays
  • Available in both matte and gloss finishes, so you can match your paint style
  • Self-healing film smooths out with the warmth of a sunny day riding
  • Low-friction surface sheds dirt easily, keeping your bike cleaner, and making it easier to clean
  • RideWrap guarantees their products for 10 years against discolouration and cracking
  • Easy to apply at home – know that some trimming may be required
  • Includes application solution, cloth, applicator squeegee, and instructions
name: RideWrap Covered Protection - Road  & Gravel Kit
